items.content_html: HTMLStrapRenderer is a lightweight JavaScript library that empowers you to effortlessly render HTML and Bootstrap UI components with ease, similar to popular frameworks like React. Simplify your web development workflow by creating modular and reusable UI elements for your projects.

items.content_html: An another indie client for the famous game League of Legends written and developed with ReactJS, NextJS, Typescript and NodeJS. Better, faster, more lightweight. Relies entirely on the undocumented League of legends Client Update API (or shorthand: LCU)
